testsuite.name: Script.ManualWorkflow

testcase.name: Login
testcase.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into EWA Enter valid user name into username field Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Click Login button Session message not appeared User logged in successfully...

testcase.name: TC_1_SendDoc
testcase.system-out: Scenario 2:Open the document and Add Redaction Annotation on the page Click on room context menu tab Select sendto workflow option Select any workflow Document send to workflow successfully dialog will be appeared... Click confirmation dialog OK button Document send to manual workflow successfully Logout the current session

testcase.name: TC_2_refrshAndLogRnishaUser
testcase.system-out: Click on Username option Click on Logout option Scenario 02: Task User Log into EWA Enter task user name into user name field Click on Login Button Login without session message... Task user logged into EWA successfully...

testcase.name: TC_3_SendAndNewItemsMetaDataAgree
testcase.system-out: Scenario 03:Task User1 Accept the workflow document Click on Todolist tab Select Newitems option Expand a document metadata option Click on Accept button Add comment in Accept dialog Click on Accept dialog OK button Task user1 Accept the document successfully... Task user1 Logout the Session... Successfully Document Move to Task User2 Task user1 Logout the Session...

testcase.name: TC_5_TaskUserVidyaAcceptTheDocument

testcase.name: TC_8_DocEndedFromTask3NishaCUser
testcase.system-out: Scenario 07: Task user3 will do End workflow Click Todo list tab Select New items Expand New items document metadata Click on Endworkflow button Enter comment in Endworkflow dialog Click Endworkflow dialog OK button Task user 3 successfully completed the workflow...
